lines.text: [repeated line by Ramirez, The Kurgan and Connor MacLeod]
There can be only one!

[narrating]
From the dawn of time we came; moving silently down through the centuries, living many secret lives, struggling to reach the time of the Gathering; when the few who remain will battle to the last. No one has ever known we were among you... until now.
I am Connor MacLeod of the Clan MacLeod. I was born in 1518 in the village of Glenfinnan on the shores of Loch Shiel. And I am immortal.
This is a house of God. People are trying to pray. You're disturbing them.
He cares about these helpless mortals?
Of course He cares. He died for our sins.
That shall be His undoing.
[gets up]
Father! Forgive me , I am a worm...
[starts laughing diabolically]

[to everyone in the church]
I have something to say! It's better to burn out than to fade away!
Why does the sun come up, or are the stars just pinholes in the curtain of night?
The Kurgan. He is the strongest of all the immortals. He's the *perfect* warrior. If he wins the Prize, mortal man would suffer an eternity of darkness.
How do you fight such a savage?
With heart, faith and steel. In the end there can be only one.

[to a pair of nuns passing by him]
Happy Hallowe'en, ladies!
Nuns. No sense of humor.
Ramirez's blade did not cut deeply enough. He was right about you. You're slime.
Ramirez was an effete snob! He died on his knees. I took his head and raped his woman before his blood was even cold.
[MacLeod looks at him in fury]
Ah, I see. Ramirez lied. She was not his woman. She was *your* woman. And she never told you. I wonder why. Perhaps I gave her something you never could, and secretly she yearned for my return.

[MacLeod attempts to throttle Kurgan in a church]
Holy *ground*, Highlander! Remember what Ramirez taught you.
I apologize for calling your wife a bloated warthog, and I bid you good day.
At last. The Gathering...
[Mini-blades pop open from Kurgan's sword before a knock is heard by his door]
Hi. I'm Candy.
Of course you are...
[after Connor has called Ramirez a "haggis"]
Haggis? What is haggis?
Sheep's stomach, stuffed with meat and barley.
And what do you do with it?
You eat it.
How revolting!

You must leave her, brother. I was born 2,437 years ago. In that time I've had three wives. The last was Shakiko, a Japanese Princess... When Shakiko died I was shattered. I would save you that pain. Please, let Heather go.
The garage is watered from the sprinklers. It also left a man's decapitated body lying on the floor next to his own severed head. The head, which of this time, has no name.
I know his name.
[Inserts cassette tape into car stereo]
I don't like boats, I don't like water. I'm a man, not a fish.
So you complain endlessly.
You look like a woman you stupid haggis.
Haggis? What is haggis?
Sheep's stomach stuffed with meat and barley
And what do you do with it?
You eat it!
How revolting!
[Ramirez sneezes]
Be still for God's sake! You'll tip us over.
So?
I cannot swim you Spanish peacock.
I'm not Spanish, I'm Egyptian.
You said you were from Spain! You're a liar!
You have the manners of a goat and you smell like a dung-heap. And you've no knowledge whatsoever of your potential. Now, get out!
[Throws MacLeod into the lake]
[after some passionate sex]
You can do that to me forever if you like, my Lord.
Aye! I will.
I've been alive for four and a half centuries, and I cannot die.
Well, everyone has got their problems
[after Kurgan rips the top of a car off and throws the driver out]
[looking over at the old woman in the passenger seat with insincere affection]

[smiling]
Mom...
Greetings.
[Connor and Heather look baffled]
I am Juan Sánchez Villalobos Ramírez, Chief metallurgist to King Charles V of Spain. And I'm at your service.
What is it?
Boom-boom. A big strong man like you shouldn't be afraid of a little boom-boom. Or maybe you think I'm trying to poison you.
I think you're crazy, Kastagir.
MacLeod, I was born 2,437 years ago. In that time, I've had three wives. The last was Shikiko, a Japanese princess. Her father, Masamune, a genius, made this for me
[shows MacLeod his Samurai sword]
in 593 B.C. It is the only one of its kind... like his daughter. When Shikiko died, I was shattered. I would save you that pain. Please... let Heather go.

[after MacLeod misses him with his sword]
Crude and slow clansman, your attack was no better then that of a clumsy child.
This cannot be, it's the devil's work.
You cannot die, MacLeod, accept it.

[laughs before realising Ramirez was serious]
I hate you.
Good. That is a perfect place to start.
Tell me how'd it happen for God's sake.

Why does the sun come up? Or are the stars just pin holes in the curtain of night, who knows? What I do know is that because you were born different, men will fear you... try to drive you away like the people of your village.
[MacLeod turns his back]
You must learn to conceal your special gift and harness it until the time of the gathering.
What gathering?
When only a few of us are left, we will feel an irresistible pull towards a far away land... to fight for the prize.
Macleod, it's good to see you again. It seems like a hundred years.
It's been a hundred years.
You can't defeat me, Ramirez! I am the strongest!
My cut has improved your voice!
[to a german soldier during WWII]
Whatever you say, Jack. You are the master race.
Take care of her, you overdressed haggis.
Wanna hear another theory?
Uh-huh.
This Fasil was so upset about the lousy wrestling tonight, that he went down to the garage and in a fit of depression cut off his *own* head!

Patience, Highlander. You have done well. But it will take time. There are generations being born and dying. You're at one with all living things. Each man's thoughts and dreams are yours to know. You have power beyond imagination. Use it well my friend. Don't lose your head.
The sensation you are feeling is the quickening.
Who are you?
We are the same, MacLeod. We are *brothers*!
He's a Highlander, by God, and the last sound he hears should not be that of a wailing woman!
What are you looking at, Rachel?
The eyes in the back of your head. People are asking about you. What am I supposed to tell them?
Simple. Tell them I'm immortal.
I don't like boats. I don't like water. I'm a man not a fish.

[singing]
B-A-L-A-N-C-E, balance...
I don't like boats, I don't like water. I'm a man, not a fish!
Oh, you complain endlessly.
You look like a woman, you stupid haggis!

Headhunter-3, Cops-Zero]
Hey Moran! Have you read what it says in here?
You kiddin' Tony? You know cops can't read.

[Teasingly to Moran]
What does 'INCOMPETENT' mean?

[Speaking to Detective Bedsoe]
That mayor, he calls me at 2 o'clock in the morning! I mean I don't even answer the phone anymore!
Hey! What does 'BAFFLED' mean? Hee hee hee hee! Ha ha ha ha!
[Moran and Bledsoe give Tony an irritated look]
I'm in disguise!

[Drunk with a wig covering his eyes whilst in the middle of a duel]
Christ, I've gone blind!
Sometimes, MacLeod, the sharpest blade isn't enough.
You talk funny Nash. Where you from?
Lots of different places.
I have the power! Aye, the quickening that empowers me! I feel everything! I know... I know everything! I am everything!
You're a liar!
You have the manners of a goat. And you smell like a dung-heap! And you have no knowledge whatsoever of your potential! Now.
[shouts]
Get out!
[rocks the boat, sending MacLeod into the lake]

[as Ramirez rows away]
Help me, I'm drowning!
You can't drown, you fool, you're immortal!
[continues rowing]
Are you a faggot, Nash?
Why, Garfield? Cruisin' for a piece of ass?
I'll tell you what happened, Russell. You went down to that garage for a blow job. But you didn't want to pay for it.
You're sick.
[Just before the MacLeod clan goes to war]
Angus, you'll keep him in one piece, ya hear?
And we all know what piece that is!

[to Ramirez]
Tonight you sleep in hell.
[Looking at the body lying next to its head]
What do you think the cause of death was, Lieutenant?
You cannot die, MacLeod. Accept it.
I hate you!
Good. That is a perfect way to start.
Will you listen to me for one moment? You can't hide your feelings from me! I've known you too long.
What feelings?
How about loneliness?
I'm not lonely. I've got everything I need right here.
Oh no you don't. You refuse to let anyone love you.
Love is for poets.
[Saying his farewell to Rachel]
Hey, it's a kind of magic!
Nice to see you Kurgan. Who cuts your hair?

[to Ramirez]
If it came down to just us two, would you take my head?
I can love and have children. Live and grow old. You never prepared me for that... you Spanish peacock.
[last lines]

Patience, Highlander. You have done well. But it'll take time. You are generations being born and dying. You are at one with all living things. Each man's thoughts and dreams are yours to know. You have power beyond imagination. Use it well, my friend.
Hey, Rockefeller. I hear you liked Candy. She said you were kinda kinky.
Don't ever speak to me.
Don't see me, Connor - let me die in peace. Where are we?
We're in the Highlands, where else? Running down a mountainside. The sun is shining. It's not cold. You've got your sheepskins on, and the boots I made for you. Good night, my bonny Heather.
If your head comes away from your neck, it's over!
So now it ends...
You only have one life! If you value it, go home!
[Connor is being chased out of the village]
Can you walk, Connor?
I'll bloody well walk out of here!
I was hoping you could give me some advice.
Are you the kind of woman who takes advice?
Sometimes.
Advice about what?
What can you tell me about a seven foot lunatic hacking away with a broadsword at one o'clock in the morning, New York City, 1985?
...Not much.
Who is the woman?
She's MINE!
Ah! Not for much longer...

[to herself, in the mirror]
You know what you're doing?

[after discovering Brenda's hidden gun]
I like your place, Brenda.
What are you doing here?
I'm looking for a dead guy named Nash. He died at birth in Syracuse, New York.
[repeated line]
Hello, pretty...
Russel Nash dies tonight.
[repeated line]
Another time, Macleod!

[as the McLeods prepare for battle against the Fraziers]
. Are you scared Conner? Ha ha!
No cousin Dugal. I'm not!
Don't talk nonsense, man! I peed my kilt the first time I went into battle!
[laughter]
Aye! Angus pees his kilt all the time!
[More laughter]

[after having just had sex with Connor]
You can do that to me forever if you like my lord.
